content.text: On August 1, 2025, the elizaOS/eliza repository showed significant activity with 5 new pull requests (4 of which were merged), 3 new issues, and 6 active contributors working on the project.
PR #5704 titled 'sessions API' by @ChristopherTrimboli is open.
PR #5702 titled 'feat: auto-install @elizaos/cli as dev dependency for start/dev commands' by @wtfsayo is merged.
PR #5701 titled 'feat: build optimization and markdown rendering support' by @wtfsayo is merged.
PR #5700 titled 'remove un-necessary/obsolete readme details' by @wtfsayo is merged.
PR #5699 titled 'chore: remove obsolete GitHub workflow files' by @wtfsayo is merged.
Issue #5703 titled 'eliza cloud railway deployment' by @samarth30 is OPEN.
Issue #5698 titled 'feat: Add IStorageService type to core' by @lalalune is OPEN.
Issue #5697 titled 'feat: Add unregisterAction to core package' by @lalalune is OPEN.
The repository elizaOS/eliza has a list of top contributors, though specific contributor details are not provided in the input.
